en:
Oh, that's just what I like to call y'all, 'cause,
ya know, you're all in different colors.
Ah, dangit. So he got away, huh?

Town's publicity, as well as my reservation's
're gonna take a hit with the crystals gone...

Do your best gettin' those crystals back!
Am way too busy, after all...
Ya sure you're not here for a reservation?
